name: freeones
description: Scrape data from freeones.com. Custom fields can only be named as follows (not case sensitive): Hair Color, Eye Color, Ethnicity, Height, Weight, Birthplace, Zodiac, Measurements, Chest Size, Waist Size, Hip Size, Cup Size, Bra Size, Bust Size

arguments.name: whitelist
arguments.description: Array of data fields to pick (possible values: 'nationality', 'zodiac', 'aliases', 'height', 'weight', 'avatar', 'bornOn', 'labels', 'hair color', 'eye color', 'ethnicity', 'birthplace', 'measurements')

arguments.name: blacklist
arguments.description: Array of data fields to omit (for values see whitelist)

arguments.name: useImperial
arguments.description: Use imperial units for height and weight

arguments.name: useAvatarAsThumbnail
arguments.description: Use the discovered Actor Avatar as the Actor Thumbnail image
